heroHeading.title: The #1 tool for VC's to automate and manage presale workflows.
heroHeading.subtitle: Automate your web 3 fundraising and token vesting operations. Keep a single data source of all your presale investments for you and your investors.

dealsManagement.title: Set up and keep all deals in one place.
dealsManagement.paragraph1: Track deal status, update project information, and manage everything related to your deals in one place. You can also import pre-existing deals or add spreadsheets to running deals.

collectContributions.title: Simplify the contribution process for you and your investors.
collectContributions.paragraph1: Presail automatically reconciles every investor, project, sheet, and form - eliminating tons of manual work. Configure access at a tier-based, whitelist, or public level. Set up multiple pools with different rules, fees & min/max limits.
collectContributions.paragraph2: You can enable KYC/AML at choice, and the fundraising page can be customized with your specific requirements - terms, deal info, or brand.

assetManager.title: Manage your investors and assets with ease.
assetManager.paragraph1: Presail is a single source of truth. View cap and token tables, manage and edit wallet and user information. You can enable a partial or full refund, even OTC trades.

investorPortal.title: A dashboard where your investors can track everything.
investorPortal.paragraph1: Say goodbye to replying to hundreds of Telegram and Discord support messages, and let your investors view investments, vesting progress and project updates automatically.
investorPortal.paragraph2: Investors get to see data on P&L and ROI at a deal and holistic level, and stay up-to-date on when they receive token distributions and how far along the vesting schedule they are.

tokenVesting.title: Securely distribute tokens on a vesting schedule.
tokenVesting.paragraph1: Get an overvíew of the vesting progress and the exact number of tokens you need to distribute. Allocations are automatically calculated in your cap table breakdown.
tokenVesting.paragraph2: Efficiently distribute tokens with Presail’s smart contract on multiple chains - no need to use spreadsheets or manual distribution tools again.

alloSwap.title: Enable OTC trades and swap allocations.
alloSwap.paragraph1: Allow investors to partially or fully trade their allocations while keeping the cap table 100% accurate and up to date at all times.
alloSwap.paragraph2: All changes are logged, and you can view past trades to understand how the cap table got to what it is today.

testimonial.description: Thanks to Presail, we have automated a lot of operational tasks in our investment group. We use Presail to manage our deals, collect contributions, and get detailed allocation overviews of all our investors. Not only does this save us time, but it also helps us reduce scam-attempts by a significant amount.
testimonial.name: Andy - Head of Finance

bestOption.title: Compliant, established & work with only a select clientele.
bestOption.paragraph1: Our philosophy is trust and availability. We’re always a DM away. And invest in audits, regulatory assessments, and security rundowns - so you’ll have the most secure and reliant tool at your disposal.

captionGetInTouch.title: Get in touch
captionGetInTouch.description: The Presail team has over 50 years of experience in development, security, finance, and design. We strive to define how token management will work in web 3.0 at a root level and are proud to serve and be trusted by the best organizations.

captionBackers.title: Presail backers
captionBackers.description: Presail is backed by Kraken Ventures, Global Founders Capital, Skyfall, Weekend Fund, the COO of Axie Infinity, and many more.

footer.description: Presail is operated by the registered Norwegian entity Datablock AS. All rights reserved.
